attributes.action: Give present immigrants who lived here for a certain amount of years the citizenship, then close the border, not letting anymore immigrants to get the citizenship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Legal immigrants who can demonstrate that they are mentally sounds and willing to contribute to the ecomony of UK, should be given the citizenship with certain conditions such as not being allowed to claim any benefits. Then borders should be closed, not letting anyone else getting the citizenship.
